events.title: The National Anthem
events.content: Lady Gaga performs, singing the National Anthem to more than 190 million people

events.title: Touchdown! Broncos 10-0 Panthers, 1st quarter
events.content: Broncos score the game's first touchdown

events.title: Start of 2nd Quarter
events.content: Cam Newton opens the 2nd quarter by running 11 yards for a first down

events.title: Touchdown! Broncos 10-7 Carolina
events.content: Jonathan Stewart makes a touchdown and searches for 'hand jive' spike more than 3,700%

events.title: Broncos 10-7 Panthers, 2nd quarter
events.content: 61-yard punt return from Jordan Norwood is the longest in Super Bowl history

events.title: Field goal! Broncos 13-7 Panthers, 2nd quarter
events.content: Brandon McManus scores for the Broncos

events.title: Interception!
events.content: Kony Ealy intercepts a ball aimed by Peyton Manning at Emmanuel Sanders

events.title: Halftime! Broncos 13-7 Panthers, end of 2nd quarter
events.content: Demarcus Ware sacks Newton on the final play of the half

events.title: Third quarter begins
events.content: Carolina starts at their own 20 yard mark

events.title: Gano Misses!
events.content: Graham Gano of Carolina misses a field goal

events.title: Interception!
events.content: Cam Newton pass to Ted Ginn at the 10 goes through Ginnâ€™s hands

events.title: End of the 3rd quarter: Broncos 16-7 Panthers
Denver wins Super Bowl 50! Broncos 24-10 Panthers
